page.title: 04Health Care In Thorpe Hesley
page.content: In the last ten years there has been a big change in this area in the way that health care is approached the people who work for Rotherham Health Authority are now interested in preventative medicine. We have a new doctor's surgery which has just been built in the village which is the centre for this Primary Care Team. There is no flouride in the water supply which means that gum disease and tooth decay have worse effects in our area. Some farmers and those involved in health care have been concerned by the pollution from the coking plant. Chest diseases and illnesses caused by stress are worse in our area.
